ygData.subject: Re: Items of interest
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to ask since I am sick of fishcakes, Where do you get muffins? Squire narl is part of the Knight adventure with that bozo that won t hand you the note
ygData.messageBody:
I have to ask since I am sick of fishcakes, Where do you get muffins?

Squire narl is part of the Knight adventure with that bozo that won't
hand you the note until you are high enough to be able to kill
squire narl.

Date sent: Sun, 25 Apr 1999 00:39:42 -0700
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
From: Rob and Deb Distante <senseirob@...>
Send reply to: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Items of interest

> From: Rob and Deb Distante <senseirob@...>
>
> Hail and well met!
>
[. . .]

>Trade Skills:
> Anyone played much with these? I Tailored at low level to make up my own
> set of Patchwork armor, but I'm beyond that now (replacing Leather with
> better at the moment). Wouldn't dream of Begging. Can't see going into
> learning to create Studded, etc Leather when Pals can wear metal stuff.
> Jewelry isn't too worthwhile unless you have an Enchanter buddy, I'm happy
> eating muffins (6 cp) and milk (5 cp) (mmmMMMmm...muffins....armmfumfumf)
> so I don't feel I need Baking (unless they have a poofy hat and apron with
> a stupid saying on it for roleplaying purposes),

[. . .]

> Lorimi (don't worry, I doubt I'll have the time to write a post this long
> in the future...), Half-Elven Paladin of Mithaniel Marr, Cazic-Thule
> server, Freeport
>
>
>
>
>
